attacks.name: Make a Wish
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it on that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) If you do, put 1 damage counter on Jirachi. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
